Voltage / Notes: 5 V to ESP32 main power input
Clean 3.3V from ESP32 regulator to sensors

ESP32 Pin / Connection:
ESC1 → GPIO 25
ESC2 → GPIO 26
ESC3 → GPIO 27
ESC4 → GPIO 14

Voltage / Notes: ESC power comes from battery – not from buck
Scaled voltage (0–3.3 V max) – same pin as CH_THROTTLE (but different function)
